name: CHROMANCER Adaptive Strategy Online Trading Card Game
blurb: Free-to-play online "adaptive strategy" TCG with groundbreaking gameplay mechanics, and an innovative approach to virtual goods.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Symbolic Supporter =============================\r\n\r\nYou have our eternal gratitude for this symbolic show of support!
Starter Deck =============================\r\n\r\nYou receive a 48-card starter deck which you can use to instantly jump in and play upon release ($7.81 value)

Kickstarter Advanced Pack ============================\r\n2000 chroma for use in our game store ($20 value); 5 Booster Packs - The Primeval\u2122 ($10 value); 1 month subscription membership ($7 value); \r\n Starter Deck ($7.81 value); Ultra-Rare Hero Card ($14 value); 1 set exclusive Kickstarter cards, ($5 value); Forum Badge + Avatar Accessories
Trader Pack ============================== 8000 chroma for use in our game store ($80 value); 4 sets exclusive Kickstarter cards ($20 value); 4 sets Forum Badge + Avatar Accessories

Kickstarter Deluxe Pack ============================ 4500 chroma for use in our game store ($45 value); 3 Month subscription membership ($21 value); 8 Booster Packs - The Primeval\u2122 ($16 value); 2 Starter Decks ($15.62 value); Ultra-Rare Hero Card ($14 value); 1 set Kickstarter exclusive cards ($5 value); Forum Badge + Avatar Accessories

Collector Value Pack ============================== 1 Card Set Box (1 copy of each card, $104.83 value); 1 Month subscription membership ($7 value); 3x INTRO PACK reward tiers ($83.43 value); 3 sets Kickstarter exclusive cards ($15 value); Forum Badge + Avatar Accessories

Supporter Pack ============================== Chromancer Digital Artbook (HD images); 1 month free entry for 1 tournament daily ($15 value); 5000 chroma for use in our game store ($50 value); 3 months subscription membership ($21 value); 3x INTRO PACK reward tiers ($83.43 value); 12 Booster Packs - The Primeval\u2122 ($24 value); 3 sets Kickstarter exclusive cards ($15 value); Forum Badge + Avatar Accessories
Extra Value Pack ============================== 1x COLLECTOR VALUE PACK reward tier ($210.26 value); 6000 chroma for use in our game store ($60 value); Chromancer Digital Artbook (HD images)

Evangelist Pack ============================== 6 month subscription membership for you and 2 friends ($126 value); 3x KICKSTARTER PACK reward tiers ($108 value); Chromancer Digital Artbook (HD images)

Real Card Set Pack ============================== 1x EXTRA VALUE PACK reward tier ($270.26 value); 6 month subscription membership ($42 value); 1 Real Card Set of 50 cards. NOTE: THE MASTER DECKBUILDER PACK AT $300 HAS A REAL CARD SET INCLUDED.

Master Deckbuilder Pack ============================== 1 Total Set Box (1 copy of each card and heroes, $272.83 value); 12 Starter Decks ($96 value); 2 Booster Boxes (42 Booster Packs); 28 Field Packs ($28 value); 5 sets Kickstarter exclusive cards ($25 value); Chromancer Digital Artbook (HD images); Forum Badge + Avatar Accessories

Deckbuilder Deluxe Pack ============================== 1x MASTER DECKBUILDER PACK reward tier ($503.55 value); 9 month subscription membership ($63 value); 2 Real Card Sets of 50 cards each. NOTE: ALL TIERS BEYOND THIS ONE HAVE 2x REAL CARD SETS INCLUDED.
Patron Pack ============================== 1 Autographed art print; 2x MASTER DECKBUILDER PACK reward tiers ($1007.10 value); 12 Month subscription membership ($84 value)
Resource Poole Pack ============================== 1x PATRON PACK reward tier ($1091.10 value); 1 Autographed Mark Poole limited edition print (1 of a set of 40).

Door Pass Pack ============================== Free entry to all daily tournaments for five years ($912.50 value); 1 Free Drafting Booster every day for five years ($3650 value);  2x MASTER DECKBUILDER PACK reward tiers ($1007.10 value); 24 Month subscription membership ($168 value); Autographed art print

Poole Pass Pack ============================== 1x DOOR PASS PACK reward tier ($5737.60 value); 1 Autographed Mark Poole limited edition print (1 of a set of 40). NOTE: ALL TIERS BEYOND THIS ONE INCLUDE A MARK POOLE PRINT.

Void Conqueror Pack ============================== Design an artifact with the dev team; Be the first holder of said artifact when introduced into the game; 1 Free Drafting Booster every day for five years ($3650 value); Free entry to all daily tournaments for five years ($912.50 value); Total Set Box for every future expansion ($2182.64 value); 2x MASTER DECKBUILDER PACK reward tiers ($1007.10 value); Free subscription membership for five years and $1/year renewal for every year thereafter ($420 value); Autographed art print

Lord of the Arcanum Pack ============================== Design and name your own Starter Deck; Personalized Deck Seal Icons for all your decks across the entire website; 3 Free Drafting Boosters every day for five years ($10950 value); Free entry for all daily tournaments for five years ($912 value); Total Set Box for every future expansion ($2182.64 value); 2x MASTER DECKBUILDER PACK reward tiers ($1007 value); Free subscription membership for five years with $1/year renewal every year thereafter ($420 value); Autographed art print; 1 Autographed Mark Poole limited edition print (1 of a set of 40); Credit as associate game producer on our website

Hero of Prisme Pack ============================== Design a Hero card with the dev team, with the art in your own likeness; 1 Free Draft every day for five years ($18250 value); Free entry for all daily tournaments for five years ($912 value); Total Set Box for every future expansion ($2182.64 value); 2x MASTER DECKBUILDER PACK reward tiers ($1007 value); Free subscription membership for five years with $1/year renewal every year thereafter ($420 value); Autographed art print; Credit as game producer on our website
